summary:
- **Management Change**: Robert Cooper appointed as Managing Director & CEO effective 2 July 2025, replacing founder Gavin Loyden. Cooper brings 30+ years of mining experience, including leadership roles at New Century Resources and Round Oak Minerals.  
- **Project**: Julia Creek Vanadium and Energy Project retains its previously reported resource estimates (2,870Mt @ 0.31% V₂O₅ mineral resource + contingent oil resource). No material updates to technical assumptions.  

*No material trading or capital markets impacts identified (leadership transition only).*
